default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You smell... unfamiliar, different from theirs... Stay calm, don't give in, I'll be right there to help you...

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: You like it? This new, more powerful form of mine.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: There are limits to how much one can mutate... I did it! I must jot this down...

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Poor little thing ... Rest in peace...

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: It's just the natural order, the strong prey on the weak.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Don't beat yourself up... Sometimes, running away is also an excellent survival strategy.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: I caught you!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Ah!

default.title: Greeting
default.text: A familiar scent... I knew it was you! I've been longing for your return... Can you take me away from this place? I hate being caged here...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: But... what you're doing is meaningless... With this Chitin exterior... I can't feel your patting...

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: You seem to work so hard... Here, try this. It's good, tastes like... chicken. It can provide you with proteins and fats.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: You smell... so good... Can I get a bit closer to you?

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I never wanted to eat it... eat them... I was just... too hungry...

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: All anomalies... stem from humanity... from within our very souls... They aren't monsters... They're fragments of who we are...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Fear not... If you ever lose your way or encounter danger, I promise, I'll be right there for you... I never leave my companions behind, I swear...

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I thought I was here to rescue you, but it was you... who saved me. I'm sorry for being such a burden and causing so much chaos... Thank you...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Did you manage to light up our friends day?... Have you done your share of job?... Were you... able to rescue them?

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Hmm? ...Is this the courtship ritual of some animal?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: You don't have to come and find me... I remember your scent. I can track you down myself.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: What can I... do for you?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: This adventure has brought so many new discoveries.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Must... adjust to the changing environment.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: But... what you're doing is meaningless... With this Chitin exterior... I can't feel your patting...

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Looks like... someone's about to be preyed on...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Level Up
sylvan_silhouette.text: The heavy, ripe fruit has fallen into your embrace.

sylvan_silhouette.title: Pat Head
sylvan_silhouette.text: How dare you touch a fae's ears? So impertinent... Ahem, I'm only blushing because my power is leaking out a little...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Obtain Attire
sylvan_silhouette.text: Sailing on a small boat across swamps, forests, and mists to reach an orchard of trees laden with ripe fruitâ€”this fairy realm kissed by the fae has never been seen by human eyes... and yet, you still found me.

sylvan_silhouette.title: Greeting
sylvan_silhouette.text: Whenever I see you, I'm reminded of that time we jumped into the rushing stream together... Care to relive that moment? Here, give me your hand, let's jump in together.

sylvan_silhouette.title: Ordinary Contact 1
sylvan_silhouette.text: You once said that at journey's end lies crystal-clear waters, branches heavy with apples, and endless bounties of food and grapes, but... without you there, even if I reached such a paradise, all that beauty... would simply fade away...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Ordinary Contact 2
sylvan_silhouette.text: This bowed apple branch heavy with fruit... is a talisman that guides humans to this place... Take it, so when you seek for me again, you won't lose your way...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Ordinary Contact 3
sylvan_silhouette.text: Legend tells of a fae who ended her journey by taking an apple and sinking beneath the waters. Under her nurturing, the plump seeds sprouted and grew into towering trees, their branches budding with flowers from which countless new versions of herself were born... Such is the way of forest spirits...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Ordinary Contact 4
sylvan_silhouette.text: Living freely in the forest like a fae... So that's your wish? Well then... hold me tight and don't let go, I'll take you for a flight!

sylvan_silhouette.title: Idle
sylvan_silhouette.text: The sound of wings fluttering through the trees, accompanied by flowing streams and frog songs... Sleep peacefully, and may the forest grant you sweet dreams...

sylvan_silhouette.title: Special Attention
sylvan_silhouette.text: There's no one else here, just our silhouettes reflected in the water... and... the two of us, in each other's eyes...
